food.question: I am long and yellow and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 My color is bright, like the sun.
〰️ I grow on a tree and I am curved.

food.question: I am round and red, and I keep the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow on trees in orchards.
🩺 People say eating me is good for your health.
🥧 You can make pies and juice from me.

food.question: I am white and fluffy. I am made from milk and I am good in a cone. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am very cold.
🐄 I come from animals.
🍦 People love to eat me in the summer.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy. Bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🌱 You can find me growing underground.

food.question: I have a shell, and I am laid by a chicken. You can scramble me for breakfast. What am I?

hints.text: 🐔 I come from a farm animal.
🍳 You can cook me in many ways.
⚪️ I am often white or brown.

food.question: I am a grain that grows in a field. People use me to make bread. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 Farmers grow me in large fields.
🍞 I am often ground into flour.
🌍 Many people eat me around the world.

food.question: I am a fruit that grows in a bunch, and can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I grow on a vine.
🍷 Some people use me to make juice or wine.
🧺 I am small and round and grow in clusters.

food.question: I am made from tomatoes, onions, and peppers, and you can dip chips in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌶️ Some people like me spicy.
🍅 I am often red.
🥣 I'm a popular appetizer.

food.question: I am a long, green vegetable with little round seeds inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am a legume.
🌱 I grow in a pod.
🍲 You might find me in a soup.

food.question: I am a nut that grows on trees. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐿️ Squirrels like to hide me for the winter.
🌰 I have a hard shell.
🍁 I fall from trees in autumn.

plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Cows like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am the color of a frog.
🐄 Farm animals love to eat me.
🌱 I need water and sun to grow.

plant.question: I have a stem and colorful petals. Bees love to visit me. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am often given as a gift.
🐝 I smell very sweet.
🌷 I come in many different colors.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.

plant.question: I grow underground and am orange. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
🐰 Bugs Bunny loves me.
💪 Eating me helps you see in the dark (sort of).

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. People like to eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often covered in butter.
🌽 I come from a tall plant with yellow kernels.
💥 I go 'pop!' in the microwave.

plant.question: I have a prickly stem and beautiful flowers. Be careful, I have thorns! What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 People often give me as a symbol of love.
🥀 I have sharp stickers to protect myself.
❤️ My flowers come in red, pink, white, and yellow.

plant.question: I am long and green and grow on a vine. I am often made into pickles. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I am crunchy and refreshing.
🥪 You can find me as a topping for sandwiches.
🌿 I belong to the same family as watermelons.

plant.question: I am a fruit that grows on trees. Monkeys love to peel and eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I am yellow and curved.
🍌 You peel me before you eat me.
💪 Eating me can give you energy.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick stalk. My syrup is sweet and delicious on pancakes. What am I?

hints.text: 🥞 I make a tasty breakfast topping.
🍁 My sap is boiled down to make syrup.
🌳 My leaves are on the Canadian flag.

plant.question: I'm a plant that looks like a tree, but I'm really a giant grass. Pandas love to eat my shoots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I'm a favourite food of pandas.
🌱 I can grow very tall, very quickly.
🎍 I am often used in gardens and can grow in warmer climates.
